short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate search boxes with a keyboard shortcut!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time by instantly going to the search box on any site, without reaching for your mouse, scrolling or clicking.

Use Alt + S to activate. This shortcut can be easily customized through the extension options.

If you experience any issues, please feel free to email me with a bug report.
